name: mobile-calendar-rest-api-client
description: Professional TypeScript/JavaScript client for Mobile Calendar API. PMS API is currently in testing mode only we will update library for production use in future.

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.example: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config dist/examples/comprehensive-usage.js dotenv_config_path=.env
scripts.example:comprehensive: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config dist/examples/comprehensive-usage.js dotenv_config_path=.env
scripts.example:invoice-generator: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config dist/examples/invoice-generator.js dotenv_config_path=.env

author: Mobile Calendar Team
